results.title: Effects of metformin on autoimmune immunoglobins and interferon-gamma in patients with early diagnosed pemphigus vulgaris: a prospective clinical trial.
results.text_hl: This study aimed to evaluate the immunomodulating effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Pemphigus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010392 @@@PV@@@.

citations.NLM: Rahmatpour Rokni G, Shiran M, Abounoori M, Houshmand G, Babakhanian M, Godazandeh G, Bayat S, Pazyar N, Abedi M, Khorshidi F, Yari F, Ghafouri Z, Patil A, Goldust M, Mirmohammadi Langari L. Effects of metformin on autoimmune immunoglobins and interferon-gamma in patients with early diagnosed pemphigus vulgaris: a prospective clinical trial. Clin Exp Dermatol. 2022 Jan;47(1):110-113. PMID: 34236726

results.title: Lifestyle medicine approach in managing pemphigus vulgaris: A case report.
results.text_hl: She was on @CHEMICAL_Methylprednisolone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008775 @@@methyl prednisolone@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, and other herbal supplements for 1 year to control her @<m>DISEASE_Pemphigus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010392 @@@PV@@@ and @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@.

citations.NLM: Solanki VK, Nair PMK. Lifestyle medicine approach in managing pemphigus vulgaris: A case report. Explore (NY). 2023 Jan 7;():. PMID: 36646613
citations.BibTeX: @article{36646613, title={Lifestyle medicine approach in managing pemphigus vulgaris: A case report.}, author={Solanki VK and Nair PMK}, journal={Explore (NY)}}

results.title: Proteomic Analysis Reveals Oxidative Phosphorylation and JAK-STAT Pathways Mediated Pathogenesis of Pemphigus Vulgaris.
results.text_hl: Furthermore, both the OXPHOS inhibitor @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and the @GENE_JAK1 @GENE_3716 @@@JAK1@@@ inhibitor @CHEMICAL_tofacitinib @CHEMICAL_MESH:C479163 @@@tofacitinib@@@ demonstrated therapeutic effects on @<m>DISEASE_Pemphigus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010392 @@@PV@@@ serum-induced cell separation, attenuating cell detachment.

citations.NLM: Cheng Y, Zhao M, Zhu C, Tang X, Wang W, Tang H, Zheng X, Zhu Z, Sheng Y, Wang Z, Zhou F, Gao J. Proteomic Analysis Reveals Oxidative Phosphorylation and JAK-STAT Pathways Mediated Pathogenesis of Pemphigus Vulgaris. Exp Dermatol. 2024 Oct;33(10):e15184. PMID: 39373252
